ygData.subject: Re: Clothing or armor for a Mage
ygData.msgSnippet: ... for ... this ... There a lot of newbie armor quests out there now.  I heard the Gnomes armor were going to be in the next patch.  You might check the
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "Steven R. Hulse" <steve@k...> wrote:
> Hi all,
>
> Well I've been playing my Gnome Mage quite a bit and I was
> wondering if anyone knew what type of clothing or armor I can get
for
> him to help his AC level? For example, would he be able to wear soft
> wicker leggings from Ak'anon or will it tell me that I can't equip
this
> item?
>
>
> Thanks!
> Shizney: lvl6 Gnome Mage
>
> Gnomes RULE!

There a lot of newbie armor quests out there now. I heard the
Gnomes armor were going to be in the next patch. You might check the
Arcane Order Armor quests in Qeynos, or the similar ones in
Freeport. These all have minor stats on them, but they're better
than cloth and sometimes even raw silk. You are well above the level
range for them so they should be easy to get.

Tuldayen Grimblade
38th Season Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule
